sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>go</radical> to a <radical>big</radical> <radical>rice paddy</radical> and establish a <radical>prison</radical> right in the middle of it to restore the <kanji>equilibrium</kanji> of the area.
meaningInfo: There was a lot of crime right here in this rice paddy, so you just built a big prison right there to lower the crime rate so this region can experience equilibrium once again.
readingMnemonic: To restore <kanji>equilibrium</kanji> in these parts, you throw all the <ja>耕</ja>ing <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja> clones into the prison.
readingInfo: The cloned <ja>こういち</ja>s were causing all the crime in these parts (or so Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> said), so by throwing them in a prison built right there just for them, this area could once again achieve equilibrium.
